sentences.english: Whenever necessary, an equity joint venture may set up affiliated agencies outside China.
sentences.chinese: 合营企业需要时可在中国境外设立分支机构。

sentences.english: Choosing standard money of charge to an account is business accounting of accounting of industry of condition foreign enterprise cannot evasive problem.
sentences.chinese: 选择记账本位币是境外企业会计核算不能回避的问题。

sentences.english: The riot was said that it was organized by illegal organizations of outside border.
sentences.chinese: 这次暴乱据悉是由境外非法组织策划的。

sentences.english: Goods in the bonded warehouse with offshorely passes in and out freely.
sentences.chinese: 货物在保税仓库与境外之间自由进出。

sentences.english: For many years, I've kept half of my stockholdings outside the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，我一直持有一半美国境外的股票。

sentences.english: Obama's silence on the Israeli action has led to some sniping abroad.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马对以巴冲突的缄默引发了境外部分人士的非议。

sentences.english: It's believed that the riot was plotted by illegal organizations abroad.
sentences.chinese: 这次暴乱据悉是由境外非法组织策划的。

sentences.english: These Measures shall not be applicable to the foreign-invested projects and overseas investment projects.
sentences.chinese: 外商投资和境外投资项目不适用本办法。

sentences.english: The relationship between Liao Dynasty and Gaoli Dynasty belonged to the one of suzerain and dependency.
sentences.chinese: 辽朝与高丽的关系为境外藩属国的关系。

sentences.english: Currently we have 26 employees, 23 are foreign expatriates.
sentences.chinese: 目前我们有26位员工，其中23位来自境外。

sentences.english: Any State functionary shall, in accordance with State regulations, declare to the State his bank savings outside the territory of China.
sentences.chinese: 国家工作人员在境外的存款，应当依照国家规定申报。

sentences.english: Bin Laden has also been charged for conspiring to kill Americans outside the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 拉登还被指控涉嫌谋杀境外的美国公民。

sentences.english: In addition, at present US firms are allowed to claim a credit against their American taxes for foreign taxes paid.
sentences.chinese: 另外，目前美国企业可以为应缴的境外税金申请赊欠。

sentences.english: Secondly, it will implement the enterprise-scale management of export revenues of domestic enterprises deposited overseas.
sentences.chinese: 二是对境内企业出口收入存放境外实行规模管理。

sentences.english: Investment companies shall be regarded as overseas promoters of limited-liability companies.
sentences.chinese: 投资性公司应视为股份公司境外发起人。

sentences.english: The method by which the general agent or sales agent pays remunerations and fees;
sentences.chinese: 境外基金机构或总代理人给付报酬及费用之方式。

definition: within and without the borders/domestic and foreign/home and abroad
to leave a country or region/outbound (tourism)
interregional/spanning two or more PRC provinces
